proposal: Diving into the decentralized world of Katla, where anyone can deploy a contract or run a Taiko node, it's clear you're reshaping the Ethereum landscape. With 45 holders in the ETH network already on board, why not amplify your community's potential? Our DEX and Lottery tools are here to complement your vision, allowing your community to not just participate, but also to thrive. Let's decentralize the future together, one node at a time.
